name: Soy and Garlic Marinated Chicken
author: CANDIELIPS
summary: This is the easiest marinade I have ever used, and one of the most popular with my family. This recipe also works well with any cut of chicken--thighs, legs, etc.
directions: In a large, nonporous bowl, combine the garlic and the soy sauce
Add the chicken and turn to coat well
Cover and marinate in the refrigerator for at least an hour
Preheat an outdoor grill for medium high heat and lightly oil the grate
Grill chicken over medium high heat for 10 to 15 minutes per side, or until internal temperature reaches 180 degrees F (80 degrees C)
